name: e2etest
description: End-to-end tests for all tools here

scripts.prepare: yarn clean; cd testProj; git init; git add .;git commit -m init; yarn install; pwd; cp -r ../testProjChange/* .
scripts.hardclean: rm -fr testProj/.git;git stash -- testProj;git restore --source=HEAD --worktree -- testProj;git clean -fdx testProj
scripts.clean: rm -fr testProj/.git;git stash -- testProj;git restore --source=HEAD --worktree -- testProj;git clean -fd testProj
